sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"亲密的"之意。
means: familiar ： 通常指因长期交往而彼此很熟悉，像自家人一样。
intimate ： 语气强烈，指感情或思想融洽、相互知心，彼此关系亲密。
close ： 语气较强，指兴趣爱好相同，因而关系密切，感情深笃。
confidential ： 指相互之间可推心置腹、彼此信赖。

sentence.Network_en: National security is the stock excuse for keeping things confidential.
sentence.Network_cn: 国家安全常被用作对一些事情保密的挡箭牌。

sentence.Network_en: From time to time he passed on confidential information to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他时不时告诉他一些机密信息。

sentence.Network_en: Police are investigating the disappearance from council offices of confidential files.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察正在调查市政办公室机密档案被盗一案。

entry.def: Information that is confidential is meant to be kept secret or private.

example.ex: She accused them of leaking confidential information about her private life...
example.tran: 她指责他们泄露其私生活的秘密。

example.ex: We'll take good care and keep what you've told us strictly confidential, Mr. Lane.
example.tran: 莱恩先生，我们会非常小心，对您告诉我们的事严格保密。

entry.def: If you talk to someone in a confidential way, you talk to them quietly because what you are saying is secret or private.

example.ex: 'Look,' he said in a confidential tone, 'I want you to know that me and Joey are cops.'...
example.tran: “听着，”他悄声说，“我想让你知道我和乔伊是警察。”

example.ex: His face suddenly turned solemn, his voice confidential.
example.tran: 他脸上的神情突然严肃起来，声音也压低了。

means.word_mean: 1. entrusted with private information and the confidence of another;
2. (of information) given in confidence or in secret;
4. the level of official classification for documents next above restricted and below secret; available only to persons authorized to see documents so classified

auth_sentence.content: The bags contained eight patients' confidential medical records.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bags contained eight patients' confidential medical records.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bags contained eight patients' confidential medical records.

auth_sentence.content: The helpline offers free and confidential support and information.
auth_sentence.res_content: The helpline offers free and confidential support and information.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The helpline offers free and confidential support and information.

auth_sentence.content: Until recently, testing was not free or confidential.
auth_sentence.res_content: Until recently, testing was not free or confidential.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Until recently, testing was not free or confidential.

stems_affixes.word_buile: confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ent……的→adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 秘[机]密的;表示信任的;担任机密工作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confident[adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的]+ial……的→相信的人才知道
dif不+fid相信+ent……的→不相信[自己]→自卑的
fid信任,相信,信念+uciary……的→相信的→信托的
in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
af一再+fid信任,相信,信念+avit表名词→一再发誓相信→宣誓书
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ant人→confidant可以吐露真情的人
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ence表名词→n.[in]信任;信心,自信;秘密,机密
fid信任,相信,信念+elity表示性质→相信的性质
in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
per假+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚

sentences.en: Please lock up these confidential reports.
sentences.cn: 请把这些机密报告锁起来。

sentences.en: The results of conference are still confidential.
We have a confidential exchange of views.
sentences.cn: 我们推心置腹地交换意见。

sentences.en: Don't become too confidential with strangers.
sentences.cn: 对陌生人不要什么话都说。

sentences.en: She is a confidential secretary of Mr. Smith.
sentences.cn: 她是史密斯先生的一个机要秘书。

jushi.chinese: 请把这些机密报告锁起来。

jushi.english: We have a confidential exchange of views.
jushi.chinese: 我们推心置腹地交换意见。

jushi.english: She is a confidential secretary of Mr. Smith.
